action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To improve transfer of earned school credits for foster youth.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Improving Education for Foster Youth Act.

section.header: Improved credit transfer for children in foster care
section.text: Subpart 2 of part E of title IX (20 U.S.C. 7901 et seq.) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 6301 et seq.) is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.header: Credit transfer of children in foster care
section.text: Each State that receives assistance under this Act shall implement policies ensuring that a child in foster care who is changing schools can transfer school credits and receive partial credits for coursework satisfactorily completed while attending a prior school or educational program.
